meaningMnemonic: You want some <radical>flowers</radical> to put on the <radical>canopy</radical> above your <radical>helicopter</radical> to keep the <radical>bird</radical>s away, so you ask people what they would <kanji>recommend</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You ask for a <kanji>recommend</kanji>ation from the <reading>cen</reading>taur (せん) that owns the local flower shop. Now he's walking around your helicopter canopy and staring at the birds, nodding.
